#this file is the text version of the binary file with comments
#you need to be clear that only 0 and 1 will appear in the binary file
00000000000000000000000000001111	#15, the length of the file ,without first 2 lines;
00000000000000000000001000001100	#0x0000020C, the start address of the instruction
00000000000000000000000000000010	
00000000000000000000000000000001
00000000000000000000000000000010	#data segment
000010 00100 00000 0000001000000000	#start of instruction, addi $4,$0,0x0200
000011 00011 00100 0000000000000000	
000001 00010 00011 00000 00000 000000
000010 00001 00100 0000000000000100
111111 00000 00000 0000000000000010
000011 00101 00100 0000000000000100
000011 00110 00100 0000000000001000
000101 00101 00110 0000000000000000
000100 00101 00100 0000000000000100
000100 00110 00100 0000000000001000
111111 00000 00000 0000000000000010
111111 00000 00000 0000000000000001	#end of instruction
